document.full_text: china has agreed to expedite the delivery of 50 fighter jets to pakistan, a newspaper reported on friday, as islamabad tries to deepen ties with beijing as an alternative to increasingly fragile relations with the united states.
document.title: china to expedite delivery of 50 fighter jets to pakistan: wsj
lines_and_colors: china has agreed to expedite the delivery of 50 fighter jets to pakistan, a newspaper reported on friday, as islamabad tries to deepen ties with beijing as an alternative to increasingly fragile relations with the united states.
